mapper.select: SELECT c.ID AS challengeId, c.TITLE AS challengeType, c.GOAL_VALUE AS targetValue, COALESCE(uc.PROGRESS_VALUE, 0) AS progressValue, -- ✅ NULL 방지 CASE WHEN uc.COMPLETED = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS completed FROM CHALLENGE c LEFT JOIN USER_CHALLENGE uc ON c.ID = uc.CHALLENGE_ID AND uc.USER_ID = #{userId} WHERE c.PERIOD_TYPE = 'WEEKLY'
